name: Swerve City (Sleepy Studios)
description:
You’re on the run in Swerve City. Try and delay the inevitable by outrunning the ever-increasing presence of police for as long as possible.

If you’d describe yourself as competitive, check out the Windows build that comes with a leaderboard system!

Controls

Left arrow/A - Turn left

Right arrow/D - Turn right

Down arrow/S - Brake

Made for Ludum Dare 50 where the theme was Delay the inevitable
